Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: TZ "TZ"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a Christmas present and what a disappointment.  The screen resolution was poor and the pictures were blurry.  I mailed it back.

Reviews.Title: Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Michelle84 "Michelle"
Reviews.Content: The camera looks nice.  Its a Polaroid.  It supposedly is a 9 mexa-pixel but the photos are absolutely terrible.  They are blurry and discolored no matter what setting.  On top of that the flash needs to recharge after each photo so you have to wait 5-10 seconds if you want to take two.  I received it for Christmas and was eager to use it right away.  It took such terrible photos that I ended up buying a disposable so we had pictures for the day. Terrible camera!!

ProductInfo.Features:
9.0 megapixel resolution, 4x digital zoom and 2.5inch bright color LCD for previewing images before you shoot
Takes video clips with audio in AVI format
Built-in flash -Flash Modes, Fill-in mode, auto mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction
Uses 2 AAA batteries
Integrated Memory 16 MB
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid A930 9.0 MP Digital Camera  with 2.5-Inch LCD Display (Magenta)
